answers.answer: I've just found out I have it and will be induced at 38wks... So 8more  weeks guess I'm gonna meet my girl x
I'm only 25 weeks so we haven't discussed that yet.  But I'm assuming so
I have it as well and my doctor didn't mention anything about inducing me. I'm currently 34w2days :-) I kind of wish they would because my baby is already 6 lbs
I'm 25 weeks. Diagnosed at 18 weeks. It has been discussed. I will likely be induced. It depends on how the baby and placenta fair.

question: Anyone else have gestational diabetes and their doctors are inducing them?
title: gestational diabetes
